description.value:
Activation: 3

You observe a weakness in your enemy’s position, then direct your squad to focus their full power on a single crucial foe.

Spend 2 focus to make a Leadership test against the Cognitive defense of an enemy you can sense. On a success, choose a number of allies up to your ranks in Leadership. On a failure, choose one ally you can influence. On the next turn of each of your chosen allies, they gain 1 that can be spent only to @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.Da4Xj4WnVbtHMH7k]{Strike} against that enemy. This Strike doesn’t count against their allowed number of Strike actions for the hands holding that weapon.
